channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 最高法院同意就特朗普是否可在特别顾问的 2020 年大选颠覆案中要求豁免做出裁决，进一步推迟对他的审判
item.description:
Supreme Court agrees to decide whether Trump may claim immunity in special counsel's 2020 election subversion case, further delaying his trial https://t.co/4fFOnl0bpL

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 国会领导人在最后期限前两天就政府拨款问题达成协议。众议院可能于周四对此进行表决。
item.description:
Congressional leaders strike a deal on funding the government just 2 days ahead of a critical deadline. The House could vote on it Thursday.https://t.co/n93ydef1rx

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 喜剧演员理查德-刘易斯（Richard Lewis）去世，享年 76 岁。几十年来，他曾在《遏制你的热情》等节目中为观众带来欢乐。
item.description:
Comedian and actor Richard Lewis, who's entertained audiences for decades in shows like "Curb Your Enthusiasm," has died at 76 https://t.co/mkwcvWGtvJ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 上诉法院法官裁定，唐纳德-特朗普必须全额支付民事欺诈案的 4.54 亿美元判决保证金
item.description:
Donald Trump must come up with the full bond amount to cover the $454 million verdict in the civil fraud trial, appeals court judge rules https://t.co/oVMofjXBER

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州官员因无法设置静脉注射管路而停止对一名死囚执行死刑
item.description:
Officials in Idaho halted the execution of a death row inmate after they were unable to set an IV line to carry out a lethal injectionhttps://t.co/lFVWBmnyyc

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 米奇-麦康奈尔计划 11 月卸任参议院少数党领袖
item.description:
Mitch McConnell plans to step down as Senate minority leader in November https://t.co/2qMtnyRy8O

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 玛丽安-威廉姆森表示，她将取消民主党总统竞选活动，理由是拜登在与特朗普的潜在对决中处于弱势地位
item.description:
Marianne Williamson says she is unsuspending her Democratic presidential campaign, citing Biden's vulnerability in a potential matchup against Trump https://t.co/VtNYtzNPac

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 哈里王子辞去王室职务后，英国政府决定剥夺他由纳税人资助的保护权，哈里王子在法庭上对这一决定提出异议，但最终败诉。
item.description:
Prince Harry loses court challenge against UK government decision to strip him of taxpayer-funded protection after he quit royal duties https://t.co/1cI3h3vqIW

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，乔-拜登和唐纳德-特朗普将赢得密歇根州的总统初选，他们将继续向各自党派的提名迈进，并有可能在 11 月进行复选。
item.description:
Joe Biden and Donald Trump will win Michigan's presidential primaries, CNN projects, as they continue marching toward their parties' nominations ahead of a likely rematch in November https://t.co/A1ocEZ8OtR

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 密歇根州初选的民调开始接近尾声，特朗普希望加强对共和党候选人提名的控制，而拜登则希望在初选中表现出色。请收看 CNN 并关注实时更新。
item.description:
Polls are beginning to close in Michigan's primary elections as Trump looks to tighten his grip on the GOP nomination and Biden aims for a strong showing. Watch CNN and follow live updates. https://t.co/Bte6YuRpGI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 28, 2024

item.title: 2002 年，两名男子被判谋杀罪名成立，Jam Master Jay 是开创性嘻哈三人组 Run-DMC 的先锋 DJ。
item.description:
Two men were found guilty of murder in the 2002 killing of Jam Master Jay, the pioneering DJ of the groundbreaking hip hop trio Run-DMC.https://t.co/gsdw8jKRIO

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一名关键证人将出庭作证，力争将富尔顿县检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）从特朗普的佐治亚州选举颠覆案中除名

item.title: 曼哈顿检察官就 "封口费 "案向特朗普申请禁言令，以阻止前总统公开诋毁潜在证人

item.title: 联邦法官裁定，因涉嫌对拜登夫妇撒谎而被起诉的前联邦调查局线人在候审期间将继续被关押在监狱中
item.description:

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）起诉阻止克罗格（Kroger）和阿尔伯森（Albertsons）之间 250 亿美元的交易，称美国历史上最大的超市合并将导致价格上涨
item.description:
FTC sues to block a $25 billion deal between Kroger and Albertsons, alleging the largest supermarket merger in US history would lead to higher prices https://t.co/a9SSN3rEBI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将于周四前往美墨边境，前总统特朗普将于同一天在那里露面
item.description:
President Biden will travel to the US-Mexico border on Thursday, the same day former President Trump will make an appearance there https://t.co/CMo9jy2YmM

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 26, 2024

item.title: 在匈牙利批准瑞典加入北约的申请后，瑞典将加入北约，这为美国领导的北约再次扩张扫清了道路，对弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）是个打击
item.description:
Sweden will join NATO after Hungary approves its bid, clearing the way for another expansion of the US-led alliance in a blow to Vladimir Putin https://t.co/by73HdqG5E

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 26, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普、他的成年儿子和特朗普组织的两名前官员对纽约民事欺诈案中 4.64 亿美元的判决提出上诉
item.description:
Former President Trump, his adult sons and two former Trump Organization officials appeal the $464 million judgment in the New York civil fraud case https://t.co/7VJ8JvIt68

item.title: 当局称，一名美国空军飞行员周日在华盛顿特区以色列大使馆外高喊 "解放巴勒斯坦 "时自焚身亡。
item.description:
A US airman who set himself on fire Sunday as he yelled "Free Palestine" outside the Israeli Embassy in Washington, DC, has died, authorities say https://t.co/xlywr3kCQx

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 26, 2024

item.title: 罗娜-麦克丹尼尔（Ronna McDaniel）宣布她将于 3 月 8 日，即 "超级星期二 "后几天，正式辞去 RNC 主席一职
item.description:
Ronna McDaniel announces she will officially resign from her position as RNC chair on March 8, days after Super Tuesday https://t.co/L9gcIeGIJv

item.title: 泽连斯基总统称有 31000 名乌克兰士兵在与俄罗斯的战争中丧生，罕见地承认了国家的损失

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，唐纳德-特朗普将赢得南卡罗来纳州的共和党初选，让尼基-黑莉在自己的家乡落败，并展示他对共和党的统治力。
item.description:
Donald Trump wins South Carolina's GOP primary, CNN projects, handing Nikki Haley a defeat in her home state and showcasing his domination over the Republican Party. https://t.co/OEXsQkqAO6

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 25, 2024

item.title: 编者注：上一篇文章已删除，本篇报道已更新，以更正对胡塞武装目标实施打击的次数。
item.description:
Editor's note: A previous post was deleted and this story was updated to correct the number of strikes carried out against Houthi targets.

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 24, 2024

item.title: 美国和英国官员称，美英联军已对也门胡塞武装的数十个目标实施了第四轮打击。
item.description:
The US and UK have carried out a fourth round of coalition strikes against dozens of Houthi targets in Yemen, officials say. https://t.co/FRYqoJZ7pZ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) February 24, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派人士发言人称，阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗体已交给其母亲
item.description:
